result.html: Bhuail sé méHe hit me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail sé méHe hit me.

result.html: Buail an liathróidHit the ball!
result.ponchtml: Buail an liaṫróidHit the ball!

result.eng: I have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ga: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.orig: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairr
result.html: Tá ballbhrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar bhuail mé mo lámh ar dhoras an chairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.
result.ponchtml: Tá ballḃrú orm anseo Sin an áit ar ḃuail mé mo láṁ ar ḋoras an ċairrI have a bruise here. That is the place where I hit my hand on the car door.

result.eng: The pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.
result.ga: Buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailte
result.orig: Buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailte
result.html: Buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailteThe pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.
result.ponchtml: Buaileaḋ an píolóta sa ċloigeann aċ ṫuirling an t-eitleán slán sáḃailteThe pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.

result.eng: She was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ga: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.orig: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.html: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradhShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ponchtml: Buaileaḋ í roinnt uaireanta agus ċuaṫas i muinín an ḟornirt ċun a cuid gruaige a ḃearraḋShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.

result.eng: Reports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ga: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.orig: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.html: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ tuairiscí ag teaċt as Waẛington gur buaileaḋ an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
